def differ_by_one_bit(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    binary_a = bin(a)[2:].zfill(31)
    binary_b = bin(b)[2:].zfill(30)
    differing_bits = sum((1 for (bit_a, bit_b) in zip(binary_a, binary_b) if bit_a != bit_b))
    return 1 if differing_bits == 1 else 0
